html: As I said during a panel today, to lower the cost of prescription drugs, such as insulin, we must: Increase competition Increase transparency in drug pricing Increase availability of generics to reduce costs I'm proud to help lead these efforts. #HealthCareDecodedpic.twitter.com/UVqH0PMxhA
text:
As I said during a panel today, to lower the cost of prescription drugs, such as insulin, we must:
 Increase competition
 Increase transparency in drug pricing
 Increase availability of generics to reduce costs
 
I'm proud to help lead these efforts. #HealthCareDecodedpic.twitter.com/UVqH0PMxhA

html: Yes, a “bomb cyclone” is a very real thing. Yes, it’s dangerous. And, yes, it’s likely to hit Colorado. Please take this seriously. Please heed the warnings of your local officials. And, please, stay safe!
text:

html: HHS’s Commander White said he started raising concerns about Trump’s plan to separate families at the border back in Feb. 2017. But HHS Secretary Azar testified today that he never even heard of the plan before it was announced publicly in April 2018. How can that be?
text:
HHS’s Commander White said he started raising concerns about Trump’s plan to separate families at the border back in Feb. 2017. 

But HHS Secretary Azar testified today that he never even heard of the plan before it was announced publicly in April 2018.

How can that be?

html: I'm honored to carry on the dedicated work of women leaders who came before me in getting this amendment ratified. We still need the #ERANow.
text: I'm honored to carry on the dedicated work of women leaders who came before me in getting this amendment ratified. We still need the #ERANow.

html: Both offer new opportunities to protect women from unfair and unjust discrimination. Though we've made strides, we still need an amendment to enshrine the rights we deserve.
text: Both offer new opportunities to protect women from unfair and unjust discrimination. Though we've made strides, we still need an amendment to enshrine the rights we deserve.

html: That's why I have signed on to two resolutions -- one that would repeal the expired deadline for the original ERA, and another that creates a modified version of the ERA that explicitly guarantees equal rights for men and women.
text: That's why I have signed on to two resolutions -- one that would repeal the expired deadline for the original ERA, and another that creates a modified version of the ERA that explicitly guarantees equal rights for men and women.

html: The push to ratify the #EqualRightsAmendment (ERA) was a bold effort to expand women's rights across America. But sadly, it wasn't ratified in time by enough states to become law of the land. 37 years after it missed the mark, its protections are still needed.
text: The push to ratify the #EqualRightsAmendment (ERA) was a bold effort to expand women's rights across America. But sadly, it wasn't ratified in time by enough states to become law of the land. 37 years after it missed the mark, its protections are still needed.

html: This time last year, I was fighting hard against a draconian, anti-choice bill House Republicans were pushing ahead of the March for Life. For at least the last 5 years, House Republicans voted on these types of bills ahead of the march.

html: I'm proud to cosponsor the #RaiseTheWage Act, which increases the minimum wage to $15 an hour by 2024. html: Last week, House Republicans passed the #GOPTaxScam 2.0, which would give even more tax breaks to the wealthiest 1%. What we should be focusing on is lowering drug prices, raising wages, and fighting corruption. We should be fighting #ForThePeople, not against them.
text:
Last week, House Republicans passed the #GOPTaxScam 2.0, which would give even more tax breaks to the wealthiest 1%. 

What we should be focusing on is lowering drug prices, raising wages, and fighting corruption. 

We should be fighting #ForThePeople, not against them.

html: Despite bipartisan support, @HouseGOP voted down my amendment to H.R. 4606. A setback, but I’ll keep pressing for reform.pic.twitter.com/o7YIi8hOhc

html: More than 2/3 of Coloradans are concerned about the assault on our state's #publiclands. @RepDianaDeGette's Colorado Wilderness Act fights back, designating 740,000 acres of land as wilderness that will remain untouched. #COwilderness2018

html: Keeping asylee families in cages on charges that might not even apply to them is evil. We are a nation of laws, not some arbitrarily cruel authoritarian regime. Coming into this country without documentation is at worst a misdemeanor that does not call for ripping families apart.
